snippet.title: Tin Hearts VR Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show at Gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
A poignant narrative adventure starring a troupe of mischievous metal soldiers, Tin Hearts is coming soon to PC VR and PS VR 2.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS
